question: Should she stay with a guy who is ill?
answer:
QUESTION

If a brother who become ill after he fall in love with a muslim sister and they been going out, so what do you think she should do stay with the brother or go marry someone else

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

At the outset, it is Haraam (prohibited) for you to have any relation with a strange man. You should immediately severe all relation with him and make Tawbah and seek Allah’s repentance. You should make Istikahra and seek Allah’s guidance in your matter. You should also consult with the seniors of your family and seek their advice in the matter. They have experience of life and will offer you the best advice in view of your situation.

And Allah knows best

 

Checked and Approved by:

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
